constraints.name: xor_sum_zero
constraints.description: 所有元素的按位异或和为0（Nim游戏后手获胜条件）

constraints.name: min_addition
constraints.description: 添加最少数量的石子使得所有元素的按位异或和为0
constraints.formal: minimize k such that XOR(a_1 + b_1, a_2 + b_2, ..., a_n + b_n) = 0 and b_i >= 0 for all i

constraints.name: distinct_solutions
constraints.description: 提供m种不同的最小添加石子方案，每种方案中至少有一个石子堆添加的石子数量不同
constraints.formal: Find m distinct solutions (b_1, b_2, ..., b_n) such that XOR(a_1 + b_1, a_2 + b_2, ..., a_n + b_n) = 0 and b_i >= 0 for all i

constraints.name: non_empty_solution
constraints.description: 每个方案中添加的石子数量总和必须等于k
constraints.formal: For each solution (b_1, b_2, ..., b_n), sum(b_i) = k

constraints.name: positive_addition
constraints.description: 每个石子堆添加的石子数量必须大于0
constraints.formal: For each b_i in the solution, b_i >= 1 if b_i > 0
